smart_goals.description: Reduce daily carbohydrate intake to 45% of total daily calories, aiming for 150g or less per day, starting from today
Increase daily water intake to 2500ml (85 cups) by the end of this week
Engage in 30 minutes of moderate-intensity physical activity at least 5 days a week, starting from next Monday
Check and log blood sugar levels before each meal and at bedtime, aiming for levels within the target range (80-130mg/dL before meals and <180mg/dL after meals), starting tomorrow
Maintain a consistent sleep schedule of 7 hours per night, starting tonight
